Пристрелянный вручную прицел для AVRE.
Стандартный прицел при поправки дальности стрельбы с помощью колеса мыши имеет погрешность которая к 1км достигает уже 50метров, в данном прицеле я попытался решить эту проблему.
Делался на основе вот этого прицела:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/675295/ru/
Слева находится стандартные риски для стрельбы без введения поправки, справа выверенные вручную риски для стрельбы с помощью колеса мыши.
Не уверен работает ли это для всех разрешений, отписывайтесь.
Докинул симметричный альтернативный прицел.
#uk_centurion_mk_5_avre_era
#centurion_mk5
#avr...

Simple Crosshair with Rangefinder for USH-405

#ush_405
#USH
#sw_landsverk_ush_405

I wanted to make a useful sight for the Stormpjas fm/43-44 since I'm not sure anyone else has made one before, so this is what I came up with. it's not adjustable as I figured it'd work better as a static sight.

Not in any way historical, but heavily inspired by sights on other recoilless rifles.

Large chevrons are even meters from 0 to 2000 meters, small chevrons are odd meters, and the small dots inbetween are 50 meter increments.

Includes a calibrated Stadiametric Rangefinder from 100-1000 meters, as sadly due to the low zoom of the sight, going up to 2km would make it miniscule.
...

Basic custom sight I made for myself.
It's in 200m steps (default is 400) which helps me to remember range when peeking.
Compatible with any vehicle, includes five zoom levels for different muzzle velocities and sight magnifications.
To install, simply drop contents in War Thunder folder.

#sight #sights #gunsight #crosshair #custom_sights

A simple version of my other BF2 based sight but this time on a screen mostly for thermals and the original one also had a rectangular sight

> The sight remains fixed when adjusted sinse it is on a screen (like the m1 abrams)
> It seems to be impossible to prevent the edges from glowing red when illuminating the sight, so my other sight looks better when illuminated: https://live.warthunder.com/post/929449/en/

This is for the ZTZ-96a and ZTZ-99 (tho you can just place the scope in another file for a vehicle with 8x zoom and it will work too)

#ztz96a #type96a #ztz99 #type99 #ztz99ii #...

Japanese Tiger Tank - Fictional Sights
Heavy Tank No.6 fictional sights. Its a modified version of the Tiger Tank Sights with disabled MG34 markings and added Kanji and Translations from german to japanese. Have fun!

Tutorial:
- Download the zip file
-open it
-create a folder in test drive for a new sights (click on settings in test drive and click a new sights)
-copy the sight into the folder
-restart war thunder
-choose it in battle/test drive

#japanese #tiger_h1 #japanesetanks #japanese_army #whatif #sights
